00052     CameraManager::CameraManager (Ogre::SceneManager* SManager)
00053     {
00054         this->SceneManager = SManager;
00055         this->DefaultCamera = NULL;
00056         this->ONodes=0;
00057         this->SNodes=0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     CameraManager::~CameraManager ()
00061     {
00062         if(NULL!=DefaultCamera)
00063         {
00064             delete DefaultCamera;
00065         }
00066         while(!Cameras.empty())
00067         {
00068             Cameras.pop_back();
00069         }
00070         while(!Nodes.empty())
00071         {
00072             Nodes.pop_back();
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076     Ogre::Camera* CameraManager::FindCamera(String Name)
00077     {
00078         for( std::vector<Ogre::Camera*>::iterator c=Cameras.begin(); c!=Cameras.end(); c++ )
00079         {
00080             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00081             {
00082                 return *c;
00083             }
00084         }
00085         return NULL;
00086     }
00087 
00088     Ogre::SceneNode* CameraManager::FindNode(String Name)
00089     {
00090         for( std::vector<Ogre::SceneNode*>::iterator c=Nodes.begin(); c!=Nodes.end(); c++ )
00091         {
00092             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00093             {
00094                 return *c;
00095             }
00096         }
00097         return NULL;
00098     }
00099 
00100     String CameraManager::CreateCamera ()
00101     {
00102         if(NULL==DefaultCamera)
00103         {
00104             String Name="DefaultCamera";
00105             this->DefaultCamera = this->SceneManager->createCamera(Name);
00106             return Name;
00107         }
00108         std::stringstream namemaker;
00109         String Name="Camera";
00110         namemaker << Name << Cameras.size()+1;
00111         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = this->SceneManager->createCamera(namemaker.str());
00112         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00113         return namemaker.str();
00114     }
00115 
00116     String CameraManager::CreateOrbitingNode (Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc)
00117     {
00118         std::stringstream namemaker1;
00119         String Name1="OrbitingNode";
00120         this->ONodes++;
00121         namemaker1 << Name1 << ONodes;
00122         Ogre::SceneNode* orbitingnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker1.str());
00123         Nodes.push_back(orbitingnode);
00124         //creation
00125         std::stringstream namemaker2;
00126         String Name2="CenterNode";
00127         namemaker2 << Name2 << ONodes;
00128         Ogre::SceneNode* centernode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker2.str());
00129         Nodes.push_back(centernode);
00130         //placement
00131         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(centernode);
00132         centernode->addChild(orbitingnode);
00133         centernode->setPosition(Target.GetOgreVector3());
00134         orbitingnode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00135         orbitingnode->setAutoTracking(true, centernode);
00136         return namemaker1.str();
00137     }
00138 
00139     String CameraManager::CreateStandNode (Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location)
00140     {
00141         std::stringstream namemaker;
00142         String Name="StandNode";
00143         this->SNodes++;
00144         namemaker << Name << SNodes;
00145         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker.str());
00146         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(tempnode);
00147         tempnode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00148         tempnode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00149         Nodes.push_back(tempnode);
00150         return namemaker.str();
00151     }
00152 
00153     void CameraManager::ClearNodes ()
00154     {
00155         this->Nodes.erase(Nodes.begin(), Nodes.end());
00156         return;
00157     }
00158 
00159     void CameraManager::ClearCameras ()
00160     {
00161         this->Cameras.erase(Cameras.begin(), Cameras.end());
00162         return;
00163     }

00165     void CameraManager::SetLocation (Vector3 Location, String Name)
00166     {
00167         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00168         {
00169             this->DefaultCamera->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00170             return;
00171         }
00172         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00173         tempptr->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00174         return;
00175     }

00273     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset, String Name)
00274     {
00275         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00276         {
00277             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00278             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00279             return;
00280         }
00281         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00282         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00283         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00284         return;
00285     }

00287     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, String Name)
00288     {
00289         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00290         {
00291             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00292             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00293             return;
00294         }
00295         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00296         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00297         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00298         return;
00299     }

00301     Ray CameraManager::GetCameraToViewportRay (Real Screenx, Real Screeny, String Name)
00302     {
00303         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00304         {
00305             Ray R(this->DefaultCamera->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00306             return R;
00307         }
00308         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00309         Ray R(tempcam->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00310         return R;
00311     }

00313     String CameraManager::GetNodeAttachedToCamera (String Name)
00314     {
00315         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00316         {
00317             Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->DefaultCamera->getParentSceneNode();
00318             return tempnode->getName();
00319         }
00320         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00321         Ogre::SceneNode *tempnode = tempcam->getParentSceneNode();
00322         return tempnode->getName();
00323     }

00325     Vector3 CameraManager::GetNodeLocation (String Name)
00326     {
00327         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00328         Vector3 nodeloc;
00329         nodeloc.ExtractOgreVector3(tempptr->getPosition());
00330         return nodeloc;
00331     }

00338             return camloc;

00357     void CameraManager::ZoomCamera(Real Zoom, String Name)
00358     {
00359         Ogre::Vector3 zoomlevel(0,0,Zoom);
00360         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00361         {
00362             this->DefaultCamera->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00363             return;
00364         }
00365         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00366         tempptr->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00367         return;
00368     }
00369 
00370     void CameraManager::ResetZoom (String Name)
00371     {
00372         Ogre::Vector3 loc;
00373         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00374         {
00375             loc = this->DefaultCamera->getPosition();
00376             Real zoom=loc.z;
00377             zoom=0-zoom;
00378             this->DefaultCamera->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00379             return;
00380         }
00381         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00382         loc = tempptr->getPosition();
00383         Real zoom=loc.z;
00384         zoom=0-zoom;
00385         tempptr->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00386         return;
00387     }
00388 
00389     void CameraManager::AttachCameraToNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00390     {
00391         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00392         if(CamName=="DefaultCamera")
00393         {
00394             tempnode->attachObject(this->DefaultCamera);
00395         }else{
00396             Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00397             tempnode->attachObject(tempcam);
00398         }
00399 
00400         return;
00401     }
00402 
00403     void CameraManager::DetachCameraFromNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00404     {
00405         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00406         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00407         tempnode->detachObject(tempcam);
00408         return;
00409     }

00411     void CameraManager::IncrementYOrbit (Real Radian, String Name)
00412     {
00413         Ogre::Radian Rad(Radian);
00414         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00415         tempptr->getParentSceneNode()->yaw(Rad);
00416     }
